reviewText: Cant find a reasonable price for the DVD Little Giants any where but here.  Also has another good movie in "LIttle Big League.
summary: Cheap hard to find copy of Little giants
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: 3 of the movies went in the trash or were given away, but I kept "Little Giants" for myself. It was really hard to find that movie at a reasonable price by itself, so I couldn't say no to this great price
summary: Only bought it for Little Giants :)
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: This four movie sports pack will blow your mind. Family favorites and great memories. This 4 film favorite will fill your whole day with memories. Good enough to watch over and over and share with a new generation.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: I have to be honest - I never watched any of the other 3 movies - I only purchased this for the copy of Little Giants. I was reminded of how awesome the movie is and have watched it a couple of times since purchasing. It was a great buy for one movie let alone four. Maybe I'll get around to watching the others eventually.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: Came in a case in great shape and the DVD's were in great shape and all four shows were the kind my son loves; funny, with kids as the stars and playing the sports he likes to play. Four great shows for the price was great.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: I bought this solely because of Little Giants. It's so 90s, and I LOVE it. Me and my cousins would watch it all the time growing up.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: While I have never seen Hometown Hero, I couldn't pass up acquiring three of my favorite childhood movies in one shot.  I especially like the fact that I found Surf Ninja's because that movies was extremely hard to find.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: I bought this for the Little Giants DVD. I really loved this movie as a child but I never owned it myself and have actually been looking into buying it for some years now but it's really expensive on it's own.I am VERY happy I bought it! And would definitely suggest buying it!
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: I bought this movie for little giants specifically, its so much cheaper than getting the single DVD itself. And with it I got Little Big league, another one of my childhood favorites. I adamantly haven't watched the other two, but just for the first two movies alone this gets my 5 star approval. Great fun for the whole family.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: We bought this just for Little Giants and the only one we have watched is Little Giants. Such a classic movie. The baseball version of The Mighty Ducks.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewerName: Ms. Christine C. Etapa "Chris Etapa Illinois"
reviewText: My grandson is into sports. When he can't play them, he likes to watch them. This DVD fit the situation. It provides hours of entertainment.
summary: Hours of Good, Clean Entertainment for Young, Sports Buffs.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: Love the movies themselves...but it says there is 4 disks included so I figured each movie was on it's own disk. That's why I bought it, I don't like double sided disks. So it was disappointing that it was only 2 disks, double sided. False advertising. If you like double sided disks, get this, if not, get the movies seperate if you can find them cheap enough.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: I only wanted this for little giants. The fact that it game with little big league was a plus. I will spend the weekend watching them both.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: I got this just for little giants.  Not a bad price for some other decent shows too.  The others shows will be fun to watch too.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: although they have perfect copies of the movies, all the movies are on one disc and contain no feature other than selecting the "play" feature from a rather low budget "Menu" screen haha
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)

reviewText: It is very entertaining and clean.  It is a great movie to add to our collection of kid and sport movies.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kids Sports (Hometown Legend, Little Big League, Little Giants, Surf Ninjas)
